titles.title: A joint resolution establishing a moratorium on the prepayment of certain mortgages insured under the National Housing Act or assisted under such Act.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 8/4/1987--Introduced. Prohibits the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development from accepting prepayments of certain mortgages insured or assisted under the National Housing Act prior to January 1, 1989.
